price: Ergasii du’a keessan booda isin kaafne akka isin (Rabbi) galateeffattaniif jecha.
arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَٰكُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَوۡتِكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: thumma baʿathnākum min baʿdi mawtikum laʿallakum tashkurūna
